{"id":1418102502,"question_id":50,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1728570080,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1418102502/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    Solution(){\n        ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n        cin.tie(NULL);\n        cout.tie(NULL);\n    }\n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        \n        if(n < 0){   \n            if(n==-1){\n                return ((double)1/x);\n            }\n            return ((double)1/x) * myPow(x, n+1);\n        }\n        else{\n            if(n==1){\n                return x;\n            }\n            return x * myPow(x, n-1);\n        }\n        return x;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
